html:
3.4.20  12:33 am   Do you put secret codes on your website or videos or music? I feel like you'd be the type to do that

     no but sometimes it's fun to give secret codes about upcoming content

3.4.20  12:05 am   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XDbjmkp4Kd4 at 1:55 the choir in this video jusmps in to a very epic chord to say the least. from my small brain music theory I can gather that the high end of the choir (saying haleluia and such) switches into a minor melody of some sorts and that creates some sweet dissonance. am i missing something? am i completely wrong? aaa what a good song

     just imagine you are in the key of D (which you are) and that's like a B7 chord. and the bass goes 3 2 1 in that chord

3.3.20  11:13 pm   Do elephants dream like dogs do?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.3.20  11:09 pm   What is the best medium upon which to place music for later consumption?

     lithosphere

3.3.20  10:39 pm   do you ever listen to songs on repeat?

     yes, but usually not automatic repeat

3.3.20  10:35 pm   why are you on the web and not the liberary?

     the web has more stuff. it even has libraries

3.3.20  10:20 pm   What do you think the 4th dimension looks like?

     ideas

3.3.20  10:14 pm   if "steve" from "hi i'm steve's real name is not steve, then what is his real name.

     the same as yours i think

3.3.20  10:13 pm   Have you ever published a hidden message or piece of content so hidden that no one has ever found it?

     absolutely

3.3.20  10:11 pm   who is your favorite artist and what is your favorite song

     what? you mean i'm not allowed to change it ... like every moment

3.3.20  10:09 pm   In a few questions you've eluded to having many videos in the works.

     that is unfortunately not quite true yet

      Are you

     A:

     building a backlog of videos to post or

     B:

      creating a method to make videos quickly and consistently? Or

     C:

     maybe something entirely different?

     very B and C

3.3.20  10:05 pm   What do with my life when I'm not good at anything? 

     you could try rolling off a log. that's pretty easy

3.3.20  10:03 pm   What's with all the complicated letters, symbols, big words and sound types in music? I want to grasp and understand this language, where do I start? 

     i would recommend trying the piano keyboard. just start pressing the keys and start making friends with what's happening there. then after a short while, i can tell you a few things which should sink right into the experiences you've already had

3.3.20  9:58 pm   Is cheese a good religion?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.3.20  9:58 pm   What is your definition of a human being

     they love to define stuff

3.3.20  9:56 pm   i'm getting anxious about doing something new and looking stupid since i've never done it before.

     me too

     any advice to help me stop thinking about it like that?

     i guess you're just not desperate enough yet

3.3.20  9:53 pm   Why are you getting so many questions about capital letters recently, is there some interesting new fad?

     no, that is a timeless classic

3.3.20  9:36 pm   Do you have a way of dealing with fancy notebooks people give you and their fanciness acts like a huge writer's block because you freak out at the idea of writing something stupid in the fancy notebook? Once I tried to just write something stupid right at the beginning to try and ward off this power

     yes that is exactly what i would recommend

     but it didn't work and now I don't want to write in the fancy notebook that has something stupid at the beginning. Help?

     you should have filled the whole thing with stupid

3.3.20  9:02 pm   Any song/video breakthroughs yet?

     it's me. i am breakthrough

     earth

     we'll see

     from real world experience

     hm, that's the kind of thing that requires a serious life strategy

     dumptruck

3.3.20  6:29 pm   How can I learn to understand music composition? 

     listen to it

3.3.20  5:52 pm   Are you still going for crisp inseam?

     not right away but soon for sure. could be weird at the moment because it sort of accidentally rhymes with something else which was also an accident

3.3.20  5:46 pm   Is the top of a song the beginning, the end, or something else?

     beginning

     I really don't know anything about music. 

     that's not necessarily knowing about music, what you're talking about is just language/lingo

3.3.20  5:37 pm   Have you ever tried working in a melody or lick from one song into another song somewhere? I know one or two videos quoted other videos inside them but I can't remember you ever doing it aurally, aside from hotwig reusing the sunrise kingdom jingle

     i usually don't do it on purpose

3.3.20  5:19 pm   oh you're a musician? name one band!

     capn geech and the shrimp shack shooters

3.3.20  5:13 pm   is this website a culmination of modernist, post-modernist, or post-post-modernist expression?

     hm, wouldn't post-modern have to be in the future

      why can nothing transcend labels

     it's actually pretty to transcend a label. just take the label off. or, it may even be more fun to just leave the label on and just be a different thing anyway. would be a nice surprise

3.3.20  5:02 pm   how do you find a purpose for life or for anything?

     well,

3.3.20  4:02 pm   How long do you think you could survive as a guest on The Eric Andre Show?

     it seems that would be entirely up to the editors. the flow of time is deeply and fully controlled by the editing, on that show

3.3.20  3:46 pm   Can you give us a certain time/date for your next video?

     don't you care about the video after that

3.3.20  3:24 pm   how to not fail in life???

     just act naturally

3.3.20  3:05 pm   is pressing the B key on a musical keyboard near the top supposed to be difficult?

     no

      I keep pressing the neighboring A# or C with it by accident. maybe getting a mini keyboard (a white key is 1.9 cm / 0.75 inches wide) was a mistake?

     ah, that could be the case. especially if you have normal to medium sized hands

3.3.20  2:49 pm   im transcribing your song "the moon is made of cheese" for a project in my harmony class. how did you come up with those cool chords and progressions?

     the whole trick is to come up with the lyrics, chords, and melody all at the exact same time. that's the only way any of it works

      also, before the ending, there are sus (major) chords going up by whole steps, but are they hybrid chords with sustained bassline or just G A B C# Eb F G? thanks for helping me out. huge fan

     the whole step sort of phenomenon ("going all the way around") is indeed happening there, but i had to finesse it quite a bit to make each moment feel right. i always promised myself i would never go 'all the way around' like that, so i definitelly had to make sure to finesse it to still keep it musical and not sounding too much like some kind of math experiment

3.3.20  2:49 pm   this whole thing is bananas, it's absolutely bonkers, don't you agree?

     yes

3.3.20  2:13 pm   whats your opinion on first impressions 

     sometimes it's fun to do them twice

3.3.20  1:46 pm   Do you plan on doing more vine style content on tik tok or other sites?

     yes

3.3.20  1:46 pm   Can you give me some motivation?

     yes

3.3.20  1:44 pm   opinions on normal people music 

     so good. you might be wondering if normal people even deserve such good music, and the answer is yes they do

3.3.20  1:10 pm   Where is earth planet

     got to be around here somewhere

3.3.20  12:10 pm   what time is the best time for inspiration?

     the wrong time

3.3.20  11:52 am   Are humans important to the universe?

     [calculating] yes

      But I know you are ( your music)
